Header: 613 Brigade Troops on Dengue Prevention Programme
Content: Under the directions of the General Officer Commanding (GOC), 61 Division Brigadier K.D.C.J Thilakaratne and under the supervision of the Commander, 613 Brigade, troops conducted a Dengue prevention programme at the Thachchanamaradamadu Tamil Mixed School in the Madhu educational zone, Mannar before commencement of the third school term on Sunday (2) . One Officer and twenty Other Rankers of the 613 Brigade attended the programme together with teachers, parents and school students.
